import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-faculty-dashboard', templateUrl: './faculty-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./faculty-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class FacultyDashboardComponent { } Faculty Dashboard



Welcome to Faculty Dashboard

The Faculty Dashboard allows teachers to manage students and attendance efficiently. You can add new students in the Add Student section, view all students in All Students, and update details under Edit Student. Attendance management is simplified with the Take Attendance and View Attendance sections.
